channel.title: Project Simple-Server
channel.description:
Purpose: The purpose of this project is to integrate a RSPS (RuneScape Private Server) with a SMF (Simple Machines Forum.)
What needs to be done: [ul][li]A php panel that uses ssh to control the status of the server needs to be made.[/li] [li]A server from scratch needs to be made that is dependent on the sql tables of a smf forum[/li] [li]Finally: Make a smf package that includes the server, the panel, and a few special components I will introduce later[/li][/ul]
Okay, let's get started.

item.title: Project Simple-Server
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

Any server suits me if it has a nice frame and no need for a restarter

Read full topic

item.title: Project Simple-Server
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:

[/quote]

Perhaps, but I wouldn’t want to go much farther than that.[/quote]
You edited The Un-Unamed to bebemecat2? o_O

Read full topic

item.title: Project Simple-Server
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Bebemecat2, post:4, topic:97002”]I only have a small idea what your trying to do, but would it be possible to connect a java applet to a database? If not, perhaps you could write a php script to access a database and return what needs to be accessed, I know you could do that with java, but what is the purpose of this? Only allow people on the server when they’ve registered to forums? The only thing that would be cool about this is, your forums could contain player info being self updated.

Sure, this could be useful, but if it was to be done, it should not be released publicly, I’m sure some script kiddie would find out how to access forum usernames and passwords and release some stuff on how to do it and there would be mass chaos.

But, wouldn’t leeching the game engine be a project people will contribute to?[/quote]

Perhaps, but I wouldn’t want to go much farther than that.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Simple-Server
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“ZeroFreeze”][quote author=thiefmn6092 link=topic=139683.msg1346562#msg1346562 date=1179650927]

You can use ZeroXEngine/ZeroPlus+ as a base. It loads character files etc. from my vBulletin forum
I’m also fairly decent a PHP, not the best but also not the worst =p

No, mine > yours. I’m sorry, but i’m going to get competitive.
[/quote]
Microsoft lover :@[/quote]

Ignorant Microsoft Hater.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Simple-Server
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I only have a small idea what your trying to do, but would it be possible to connect a java applet to a database? If not, perhaps you could write a php script to access a database and return what needs to be accessed, I know you could do that with java, but what is the purpose of this? Only allow people on the server when they’ve registered to forums? The only thing that would be cool about this is, your forums could contain player info being self updated.

Sure, this could be useful, but if it was to be done, it should not be released publicly, I’m sure some script kiddie would find out how to access forum usernames and passwords and release some stuff on how to do it and there would be mass chaos.

But, wouldn’t leeching the game engine be a project people will contribute to?

Read full topic

What needs to be done:
